title: Dudhi channa - Indian curried gourd with Bengal gram
ingredients: ['1 calabash (bottle or dudhi) gourd, peeled, cut into cubes', '100g split Bengal gram (channa daal)', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '750ml water', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '4 dried red chillies, broken into pieces or crushed chillies to taste', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar']
